thread.section_title: San Francisco Airport Marriott Waterfront - UPDATED 2017 Hotel Reviews & Price Comparison (Burlingame, CA) - TripAdvisor
thread.title: Met all expectations
thread.title_full: Met all expectations - Review of San Francisco Airport Marriott Waterfront, Burlingame, CA - TripAdvisor

author: ASeasonedTraveler060
title: Met all expectations
text:
High quality Marriott right on the waterfront. Large light-filled atrium to eat, dine or just relax while watching the planes land and takeoff. Easy access to airport and downtown San Francisco. Large comfortable room with high quality Marriott bedding and related accessories. Clearly a business (or even leisure) traveler's excellent choice.
Room Tip: Definitely request a water view. See more room tips
